python.title: Complete Python Code snippet for quick reference
python.description:
Key Topics Covered:
Basics: Arithmetic, Variables, Lists, Conditionals, Loops, Functions.
Intermediate: Dictionaries, String manipulation, List comprehensions, Error handling, Lambda functions, File handling.
Advanced: OOP, Generators, Decorators, JSON.

sql.title: Complete SQL Code Examples for quick reference
sql.description:
Key Topics Covered:
Basics: Creating tables, inserting, updating, deleting data, and basic SELECT queries.
Intermediate: Joins, aggregate functions, grouping, filtering, pattern matching, and subqueries.
Advanced: Union operations, views, indexes, transactions, advanced joins, conditional logic, and stored procedures.

git.title: Complete GIT Version Control syntax for quick reference
git.description:
Key Topics Covered:
Basics: Initializing repositories, checking status, adding files, committing, cloning, and viewing history.
Intermediate: Branching, merging, deleting branches, stashing changes, working with remote repositories, and undoing changes.
Advanced: Rebasing, cherry-picking commits, tagging, resetting and reverting commits, resolving merge conflicts, and squashing commits.

linux_shell.title: Complete Linux Shell commands for quick reference
linux_shell.description:
Key Topics Covered:
Basics: Navigating directories, creating/removing files, viewing file contents, file permissions, and basic output redirection.
Intermediate: Piping commands, using variables, shell loops, conditionals, processes, and file searches.
Advanced: Functions, cron jobs, shell scripting, AWK, Sed, networking commands, and file compression/archiving.

java.title: Complete Java language examples for quick reference
java.description:
Key Topics Covered:
Basics: Printing to the console, variables, arithmetic operations, conditional statements, loops, and arrays.
Intermediate: Methods, classes and objects, switch-case, strings, and exception handling.
Advanced: Inheritance, polymorphism, abstract classes, interfaces, collections (ArrayList), and file handling.

selenium.title: Selenium Syntaxes and examples for quick reference
selenium.description: Basic automation, handling forms, browser windows, working with alerts, screenshots, dropdowns, and dynamic content.

pandas.title: Python pandas module examples for quick reference
pandas.description: Creating DataFrames, selecting columns, filtering data, handling missing data, merging DataFrames, pivot tables, sorting, etc.

c.title: Complete C language Syntax and examples for quick reference
c.description: Basic operations, arrays, pointers, file handling, functions, and structures.

cpp.title: Complete C++ language Syntax and examples for quick reference
cpp.description: Classes, objects, file handling, and functions, along with advanced concepts like inheritance.

csharp.title: Complete C# [C Sharp] language Syntax and examples for quick reference
csharp.description:
Key Topics Covered:
Basics: Printing to the console, working with variables, arithmetic operations, and conditional statements.
Intermediate: Functions, loops, arrays, object-oriented programming (OOP) basics like classes, and exception handling.
Advanced: Inheritance, polymorphism, interfaces, LINQ, file handling, delegates, lambda expressions, and async/await for asynchronous programming.
